TextAsset.value: I'm going to be in the stands, cheering for you!
I have to the last tune-ups with Tomari, now.
I was going to dedicate my race to ...........
..... Maybe I'll dedicate one of my laps to you.
(Wow... That was really sweet, in its own icy, aloof... Extremely distant way.
I'd like to think we're friends.)
(I suppose I'll head down to the track now so I can get a good seat.
I wouldn't want to get stuck all the way in the back!)
(It looks like the race has already started!)
(I'm so small, it's easy to squeeze through the crowd... I got front row seats!)
(The bikes are all moving so fast... It's hard to tell which one is Hiromi's.)
Are you a racing fan too?!
I guess you could say I'm becoming one. I'm here to cheer a friend.
My name's Toby, by the way!
You know, I'm cheering really hard... But honestly, I can't really tell which one she is.
They're all kind of blurry huh?
To tell you the truth, I always cheer for the prettiest lights.
UMMM.... WHOEVER INVENTED THE MOTORCYCLE FOR INVENTING THE MOTORCYLE!!!
Y-YEAH, WHOOO! THAT ONE BIKE.... BEAT THAT OTHER BIKE!
Thanks... I'm sort of a novice at this...
Me? I'm a student at Namco High.
I see... Do you like it?
It's not bad. I'm stuck in detention, though.
Ohoho, I'm hanging out with a delinquent!
It's okay... My friend is a delinquent too.
Enough of a delinquent to have been held back a few times.
Haha... Toby's fine. I was in the United Galaxy Space Force.
(I guess if Galaga is a spaceship... This isn't much of a stretch.)
I was in the Battle of Baraduke, ‘85… I’m a space fighter. It’s nice, though… things are pretty calm recently. I’ve been catching up on my stories.
(Wow... There are all kinds of people in this crazy world.)
This race is very important to me.
I've promised to go on a trip... But only if SHE wins this race.
But I'm a little nervous about it... I'm not used to just... Doing something.
I prefer to have a plan. It’s important to always have a battle plan!
You're talking about … like… space battle?
Yeah! Well, not just space battles.
It’s good to have an idea of what you’re going to do, but sometimes… There’s more to life than that, right? It's more than just preparing for every possible contingency.

True... But I don’t know! I’m still nervous about it. Maybe I watch too much TV! But aliens are real, so anything could be! I just don’t know if SHE would understand my concerns… she’s somewhere between confident and impetuous, y’know?
.... We are talking about Hiromi, right?
WAIT, how do you know her name?!
I've been hanging out with her at Auto Shop. Although she called you Kissy…
She’s the only one who does.
OH! You must be the new pal she was talking about!
(Did she call me that?! Gosh... I'm flattered.)
She's been really happy lately. Usually it's just me and her, and she doesn't complain, but still... I'm so glad she's made a friend!
I used to think Hiromi was a little morose, but that's not her at all. She's just...
I was always overthinking, trying to decipher what angle she's coming from...
but the truth is, she always takes the shortest path between two points.
I bet the neurons in her brain are all like little roads, going the shortest distance from point A to point B.
I've been trying to pick it up from her... It helps me keep focused too... to simplify my thinking and concentrate on the important things.
And the most important thing right now is this trip we’re planning!

Toby... You should just tell her how you feel. Tell her exactly what's on your mind. If you're nervous... It doesn't hurt to let her know. And likewise… tell her to be clear about her expectations as well.
I know... But she's so cool. Like a lone wolf! Or a pterodactyl!
Sometimes it's hard to tell if she cares. I mean, I know she does... But we're not very similar that way.
I can't stop telling people what I'm thinking. Even complete strangers!
I've known you for 10 minutes and I already know more about you than Hiromi!)
I think it's just how she is. She's very content with the few things she has... You, her motorcyle, and her dream.
If she didn't care, she probably wouldn't even hang around... Y'know?
They're on their final approach! But I can't see who's up front.
Only ONE racer could possibly be that pink.)
And the winner is... HIROMI TENGENJI!
(After that... We headed back to the garage.)
(I can't believe I ran into Hiromi's partner.
Oh, hey Kissy. Did you see?
Do you guys know each other?
Actually... I'll catch up with you in a minute. I think Toby has some things to say to you.
He's right Toby. Tell Hiromi how you feel.
Hiromi... I believed in you today, and I'll totally believe in you...
But... I want to be honest with you. I'm a little nervous about this trip.
........ I know. I got the prize money... But we should wait a little longer. Let's save up some more money, lay down some plans.
Yeah. You're right. I should consider your feelings. We can't wait around forever, but this feels like the right thing to do.
Phew... I'm gonna head home. It's been a long day, and all that cheering tuckered me out.
(AH! She kissed me on the cheek!)
It can't be fun to be between two people like that.
